To help the community learn more about Native Client,
we're giving technical talks at major universities.
Watch this page for information about future talks.

<wiki:toc />

If you weren't able to attend a talk, please watch the
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8m9U7p_Ntk Stanford video].
You can also look at the
[http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/NaCl_Talk_Jan09.pdf slides (PDF)].
